For whatever reason I didn't find a single crack that worked for the 1.9 patch, but as I'm not using dx11 nor do I much care about the high-res textures, I settled on the 1.8 patch instead.

This crack + patch 1.8 = perfect. No problems of any kind so far, I loaded several saves and everything worked great. And the 1.8 patch is also great, because it fixes all the nanocatalyst problems, which is basically the only thing I cared about!
